channel.title: INtech
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from INtech, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.description: With this merger, Dott and Tier didn’t want to build a conglomerate of micromobility services; the operation was all about scale. © 2024 TechCrunch. A...

item.title: Want to Buy a Smart Glass Door? It Just Got a Little Bit Cheaper
item.description: Can’t decide between clear or frosted glass? Home Depot’s Smart Glass door, available starting today, lets you have both for a reasonable price.

item.title: KitchenAid Promo Code: 15% off major appliances
item.description: Save 15% on KitchenAid’s iconic major appliances, such as mixers, dishwashers, microwaves and more with our discount code.

item.title: Get Your VP Debate Bingo Card Right Here
item.description: Vice presidential nominees J.D. Vance and Tim Walz are debating tonight. Let's follow along together!

item.title: Verified Walmart Promo Codes for October 2024 | WIRED
item.description: Save big with thousands of daily savings and Walmart coupons for up to 65% off flash deals on tech, appliances, and much more.

item.title: Sequoia backs Pydantic to expand beyond its open source data-validation framework
